title: Kelly Oubre | Ep 59 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Kelly Oubre | Ep 59 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
New Warrior's forward Kelly Oubre joins Matt and Stak on Episode 59 of All The Smoke. The former Sun opens up about being traded for the 2nd time in his career, getting to play with Steph Curry and discusses his new teammate Klay Thompson's injury. Plus Oubre talks about his time in Phoenix with Devin Booker and shares what it was like being drafted by the Wizards and playing with John Wall and Bradley Beal early in his NBA run.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
